summary: Almost forty years after the John F. Kennedy assassination, an ex-Marine named Walter Ohlinger has come forward with a startling claim.
cast: Raymond J. Barry|Dylan Haggerty|Renee Faia|Kelsy Kemper|Dennis Lau|Sonny Franks|Jared McVay|Christel Khalil|Lillias White|Kate Williamson|Jack Tate|Nicolas Mize|James Hiser|Darrell Sandeen|Evan O'Meara|Robert Thompson|Jimmy Burke|Eileen Rogers|Mike Wood
keywords: dallas texas|federal bureau of investigation|first lady|president|john f. kennedy assassination
title: Entrevista con el asesino
